content.description: Short, but packs a punch; crush this one like a laptop under a heavy book.  Start as low as you can on the obvious rail and make some tense moves to gain the big sidepull, then go straight up the face.
content.location: The big rail features on the East corner of the Fateful Findings Block

content.description: Great for the grade.  Follow a right hand crack and crystally left hand features up the South corner of the boulder.
content.location: The South corner of the closest block to the road.

content.description: Start in the same seam that is used on "It's a Magical Day!" but on the right side, using it like a lieback.  Make a move or two up and right to gain the big shelf.  Mantle onto it, then top out straight up.
content.location: Immediately to the right of "It's a Magical Day!"  Identifiable by the big shelf for the mantle.

content.description:
Techy moves, awesome features, and a perfect landing make this an instant classic!  This is easily the best line in the area so far and one of Pinedale's finest.

Start on two opposing smeary thumb catches in the center of the big face and make a balancy move to gain the good undercling.  Float over to the rail and follow it to the top!
content.location: This problem is on the tall East face of the block, directly behind the Forest Service sign and facing the road.  Easily identifiable by the big right trending rail feature.

content.description: Start on a good left hand edge and right hand crimp.  Pull up on another good right crimp and reach for a left hand sidepull.  Up and over from there.
content.location: To the left of "It's a Magical Day!" in the center of the face, right by a small tree.

content.description: Follow a series of sidepulls and rails to the top.  Can be topped out directly, or on the rail higher and to the right for more excitement.
content.location: On the East face of the Fateful Findings boulder, between the namesake problem and Laptop Massacre.
